Body:
Description: Hello, in our enpoint protector we recieve the following message:
Your appliance is running low on disk space, there is 28.81 gb free available from 257.22 gb (11%). EPP Server functionality and performance may be severely affected. Use Audit Log Backup to reduce the logs stored in the database, delete older system and audit log backups, and tune policies to reduce incoming log count. For further assistance contact Support.

We try to liberate space in Audit log backup section without success. 
we need to delete information older than 6 months in endpoint protector

thanks

What We've Learned Updated: 16/05/2025
Client is having an issue with the allocated space for his EPP appliance as it is almost full and needs to free up some of it.

Next Steps Updated: 16/05/2025
Need to connect remote and clean up some space.
Will schedule a remote session.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, pablo martin

What We've Learned Updated: 16/05/2025
Client is having an issue with the allocated space for his EPP appliance as it is almost full and needs to free up some of it.

21/05/2025
Connected remote along with Adrian to solve the issue the customer is facing.
We have checked the backend and from what we have found, client had around 168 GB of shadows occupying the disk.

He already had them copied through the external storage option so he agreed to have them deleted.
After deleting them, we went on and recreated the oshadow and capshadow files accordingly and tested on the UI side.
Everything was working as expected.

Agreed to keep the ticket opened for another day and he will follow up with us tomorrow.

Next Steps Updated: 16/05/2025
Need to connect remote and clean up some space.
Will schedule a remote session.

21/05/2025
Will send a note to follow up in regards of the today's remote session.
